GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, the user can also query the topic which will only serve the user articles with that topic

GET /api/articles/:article:id.description: Serves an object containing the article id searched for

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of objects containing the comments for a particular article

exampleResponse.body: This is a bad article name
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Allows a user to add a comment to a spceific article. The required information is a username and body an the return value is the comment that was posted

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Allows a user to alter the number of votes for an article

GET /api/users.description: serves the user with all of the users stored

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Allows a user to delete a comment on status 204 so no content will be returned to the user
